site_name: LAND ON THE EAST SIDE OF, 68 RAVENSBOURNE PARK CRESCENT, LONDON, SE6 4YP
description: An application submitted under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 for Minor Material Amendments in connection with the planning permission DC/24/135333  dated 16 October 2024  for the variation of Conditions 2 (Approved Plans), 6 (Refuse and recycling storage facilities), 7 (Cycle storage facilities), 8 (Hard Landscaping) and 9 (Soft Landscaping), 10 (Boundary treatments), 11 (Living Roofs) , 19 (PV Panels) and 22 (security gate)  to allow:- the revised floor plans , elevations, materials, landscaping and external works, refuse storage , cycle storage,   hard landscaping, boundary treatments, living roof , security gate and removal of PV panels and pocket park on Land on the East side of 68 Ravensbourne Park Crescent SE6. .
